name: EcoYeti
description:
EcoYeti

This little project was created as a part of the (first?) AIE International X-Campus Jam that took place on with the theme, "This has all happened before." Our goal was to recreate ski-free except you're the yeti.

Save the snow owl eggs from the clutches of passing skiers or face their extinction!

Assembled by the "Save the Snow Owls" Team:

  • Bryson Au
  • Terry Nguyen
  • Kevin Bryan
  • Megami Jadeheart
  • Evan Witt
